description: A platform game made with React
detail: Dish Dash is a platform game that the player become a server who must keep customers happy by serving the food that they want.

description: A mock single page application site for streaming videos
detail: Brainflix is a school project to build out a prototype for a new video streaming platform. A package and mockup of the final product was provided. Mock API is used to obtain data for videos.
Brainfarm is a simple browser game where user can grow crops and make money.

description: An app for managing warehouses and inventories
detail: Instock is a team school project to deliver an Inventory Management System in one week. Our team was provided a mockup of the final product on Figma. We used Git/GitHub, JIRA and the Scrum methodology to work collaboratively and manage workflow.

description: A simple chat application that allows users to talk to each other in real-time.
detail: This is a real-time chat application using Socket.io. User can add friend with ID, chat real-time with friends, and edit their profile.
